title: Create V4.3 Story Template
description: Create a comprehensive story template for V4.3 that includes all new fields with helpful comments and examples. This template will be used by CTO agent and humans when creating new stories.

objective.i_want: a V4.3 story template with all fields documented
objective.so_that: I can create properly formatted stories without missing fields

acceptance_criteria.description: Template includes all V4.3 required fields
acceptance_criteria.ears_format: WHEN template used THEN all required fields are present
acceptance_criteria.test_approach: Create story from template, validate against schema

acceptance_criteria.description: Template includes all V4.3 optional fields
acceptance_criteria.ears_format: WHEN template reviewed THEN all optional fields are shown (commented or with defaults)

acceptance_criteria.description: Each field has helpful description comment
acceptance_criteria.ears_format: WHEN field examined THEN description explains purpose and format

acceptance_criteria.description: Example values provided for complex fields
acceptance_criteria.ears_format: WHEN complex field found THEN example value demonstrates correct format
WHEN template validated THEN no schema errors

notes: Template should be immediately usable. Include realistic example data.
